Translations.Text: So she conceived him, and she retired with him to a remote place
And the pains of childbirth drove her to the trunk of a palm tree. She cried, “O, I wish that I had died before this, I wish that I had been a thing forgotten and out of sight.”
But a voice cried to her from beneath the palm tree, “Grieve not, for your Guardian Evolver has provided a rivulet beneath you
“And shake towards yourself the trunk of the palm tree. It will make fresh, ripe dates fall upon you
“So eat and drink, and cool your eye, and if you see any person say, ‘I have vowed a fast to God, the Merciful Benefactor, and this day I will not enter into any conversation with any human being’ ”
Then she brought him to her people carrying him. They said, “O Mary, truly a curious thing have you brought.”
“O sister of Aaron, your father was not a man of wrong doing, nor your mother a woman unchaste.”
But she pointed to the baby and they said, “How can we talk to one who is a baby in the cradle?”
He said, “I am indeed a servant of God, He has given me revelation and made me a prophet
“And He has made me blessed wherever I am, and has recommended to me prayer and the paying of zakat as long as I live
“He has made me kind to my mother, and not overbearing or miserable
“So peace be upon me the day I was born, the day that I die, and the day that I will be raised up to life again.”
Such was Jesus the son of Mary. It is a statement of truth, about which they dispute
It is not befitting to God that He should have a son. Glory be to Him. When He determines a matter, He only says to it “Be” and it is
Indeed God is my Lord and your Lord. Therefore serve Him, this is a way that is straight
But the sects differ among themselves, and woe to the unbelievers because of the judgment of a momentous day
How plainly will they see and hear, the day that they will appear before Us, but the unjust, this day they are clearly in error
But warn them of the day of distress, when the matter will be determined, for they are negligent and they do not believe
It is We Who will inherit the earth, and all beings. To Us they will all be returned
Abraham, he was a man of truth, a prophet
Behold, he said to his father, “O my father, why worship that which hears not and sees not, and can profit you nothing
“O my father, knowledge has come to me which has not reached you. So follow me, I will guide you to a way that is balanced and straight
“O my father, serve not Satan, for Satan is a rebel against God, the Merciful Benefactor
“O my father, I fear lest a penalty afflict you from God, the Merciful Benefactor, and that you will become a friend to Satan.”
He replied, “Do you hate my gods, O Abraham? If you do not cease, I will indeed stone you. So get away from me now.”
Abraham said, “Peace be on you. I will pray to my Lord for your forgiveness, for He is to me the Merciful Benefactor
“And I will turn away from you all, and from those whom you invoke besides God. I will call on my Lord, perhaps because of my prayer to my Lord, I will not be unblessed.”
Once he had turned away from them and from those whom they worshipped besides God, We bestowed on him Isaac and Jacob, and each one of them We made a prophet
And We bestowed Our mercy on them, and We granted them honor on the tongues of truth
Also, mention in the Book, Moses, for he was specially chosen, and he was a messenger, a prophet
And We called him from the right side of the Mountain, and made him draw near to Us to converse
And out of Our mercy, We gave him his brother Aaron, a prophet
Also mention in the Book, Ishmael. He was true to what he promised, and he was a messenger, a prophet
He would recommend to his people prayer and zakat, and he was most acceptable in the sight of his Lord
Also mention in the Book the story of Idris. He was a person of truth, a prophet
And We raised him to a lofty station

Those were some of the prophets on whom God bestowed His grace, from the posterity of Adam, and of those who We carried with Noah, and from the posterity of Abraham and Israel, from those whom We guided and chose. Whenever the signs of God, the Merciful Benefactor, were rehearsed to them, they would fall down in adoration and in tears
